abilities.description: Luffy outstretches his arm and skims the surface of the sand to uppercut the opponent from afar. Specifically designed for sandy terrain combat.
abilities.significance: Anime-original technique demonstrating Luffy's ability to adapt his Devil Fruit powers to different environments and fighting conditions. First seen while Luffy was hallucinating and fighting Zoro.

abilities.description: Similar to Gomu Gomu no Rocket, Luffy wraps his arm around a round object multiple times to make it very firm, then spins around the object before getting shot very far and high in his desired direction.
abilities.significance: Anime-original technique showing Luffy's creative problem-solving. Used to escape the collapsing underground ruins. Demonstrates a more controlled version of his typical rocket technique.

keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu no Sadowari Debut
keyMoments.description: First use of the Sand Splitter technique during Luffy's hallucination-induced fight with Zoro.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy can instinctively adapt his powers even while impaired by hallucinations.

keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu no Zenmai Debut
keyMoments.description: First use of the Spring technique to escape the collapsing underground ruins.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's ability to develop new techniques in crisis situations.

reveals.information: Luffy can adapt his rubber powers for sandy terrain combat with Gomu Gomu no Sadowari
Luffy can create a more controlled spring-like launch with Gomu Gomu no Zenmai
